start.text: These warmongers, the descendants of apes and pigs...
I've got it all. We kill them even with shoes.
We have sent young men to Sindria, to Anar, to Yggdrasil...
Welcome to our show, which will deal with wife-beating.
By God, you people are dogs. I will go on as usual.

start_boss.text: How do you think he acquired that ship? Through jihad.

retreat.text: By next year, God willing, you will be annihilated.
To be honest, I never expected to see such a spectacle.

out_of_missiles.text: We have a whole jungle of missiles at our orbital.
Parts are falling off the heretic. God is great.

engaged.text: I promise you, once we're in range, I'll teach you a new kind of defeat.
We will give them fertility. We will breed children with them.
I shall liberate you from the capitalists.

need_help.text: By God, I swear that if you win I will grow a tree and once it is fully grown I will hang myself from it.
They shouted, 'Death to the unclean!', and it came true.

pursuing.text: What is the cure for such disorders? Beatings.
A complex operation will be carried out by our martyrs.
If you just look with your eye, it will be gouged out.

running.text: I swear to you I won't go home until you are gone.

hull_90.text: If you call this fighting, I swear to God that I will shoot myself right here.
They want to tell people that Luddism is a very dangerous religion.

hull_50.text: By God, behave yourself! I will give you a taste of my shoe!
This is my only comment. A worn-out shoe is my only comment.

hull_30.text: By God, I have encountered cases of cancer.
I will beat you with 30 lashes for your insolence.
If only the fall had finished them off, thus relieving humanity of them.

overload.text: We do not know how to run things. Neither in politics nor in technical matters.
Take my skin. Turn it into a fuse or a slingshot for a child.

death.text: By God, a faithful's fingernail is worth more than a thousand unclean.
But God willing, your faction will soon be cleaned from augmentation and idolatry.
Oh God, completely destroy and shatter the unclean.

victory.text: I admit that I was a bit disappointed, because I had hoped for a larger toll.
God did not curse the worm or the moth as much as he cursed your kin.
This is well known. If you did not participate in the cleansing, you don't get to share the booty.
We should be happy that he died. Let him go to Hell.
